item.title: Version 1.0
item.description:
What's New

  • Record audio from any app on your Mac - Zoom, Teams, Slack, Google Meet, and more
  • AI transcription powered by advanced on-device models for instant, private transcriptions
  • Export to multiple formats - WAV, MP3, M4A, or FLAC
  • Privacy-first design - all recordings stay local on your Mac by default
  • Customizable workflow with hotkeys, audio source selection, and quality settings
  • Chat with your recordings using AI to get summaries and find key moments
